rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Only one case has been reported in a human in an apparent transfer of the virus from another mammal: a man in Texas who had been in contact with dairy cows.

rationale: The segment contains neutral reporting but no high-potency verbs or metaphors.
